title: 'Wolf of Wall Street' inspiration Jordan Belfort reportedly charged $40,000 for a 2-day crypto workshop at his Miami estate — three years after he called Bitcoin a 'mass delusion' - Yahoo Finance
content: 'Wolf of Wall Street' inspiration Jordan Belfort reportedly charged $40,000 for a 2-day crypto workshop at his Miami estate — three years after he called Bitcoin a 'mass delusion'  Yahoo Finance
description: Three years ago, Jordan Belfort compared buying Bitcoin to the Titanic: "You're on a sinking ship ... don't get sucked into this frickin' insanity."
